parsing_result:
# Image Quality Setting (Movie Recording)

Adjust image quality settings for movies.

To display image quality settings, press **MENU/OK** in the movie shooting display and select the !Image Quality Setting Icon (IMAGE QUALITY SETTING) tab.

!Image Quality Setting Menu

*The options available vary with the shooting mode selected.*

## Film Simulation

Options are the same as those for still photography, but settings must be adjusted separately (page 122).

## Monochromatic Color

Options are the same as those for still photography, but settings must be adjusted separately (page 124).
